#Inner and outer returns.
<wiki:toc/>

== Introduction ===
Snow renames the return keyword to `<-` and introduces `<--` as an inner return that works inside all control structures.

== Matrix ==
<table border="1" cellpadding="5">
    <tr>
        <td><strong><- some_var</strong></td>
        <td><strong>return $some_var</strong></td>
    </tr>
</table>
